title: Rider transfer ticker: Bagioli to Lidl-Trek, Barguil to DSM, Nizzolo to Q36.5
content:
Follow all the main moves of the 2023 'transfer window' for the men's and women's pelotons.

Read the full article at Rider transfer ticker: Bagioli to Lidl-Trek, Barguil to DSM, Nizzolo to Q36.5 on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
